Module Contents

.. py:class:: DatabaseSchemaEditor

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.db.backends.base.schema.BaseDatabaseSchemaEditor`


   .. py:attribute:: sql_rename_table
      :value: 'RENAME TABLE %(old_table)s TO %(new_table)s'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_alter_column_null
      :value: 'MODIFY %(column)s %(type)s NULL'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_alter_column_not_null
      :value: 'MODIFY %(column)s %(type)s NOT NULL'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_alter_column_type
      :value: 'MODIFY %(column)s %(type)s%(collation)s%(comment)s'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_alter_column_no_default_null
      :value: 'ALTER COLUMN %(column)s SET DEFAULT NULL'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_delete_column
      :value: 'ALTER TABLE %(table)s DROP COLUMN %(column)s'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_delete_unique
      :value: 'ALTER TABLE %(table)s DROP INDEX %(name)s'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_create_column_inline_fk
      :value: ', ADD CONSTRAINT %(name)s FOREIGN KEY (%(column)s) REFERENCES %(to_table)s(%(to_column)s)'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_delete_fk
      :value: 'ALTER TABLE %(table)s DROP FOREIGN KEY %(name)s'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_delete_index
      :value: 'DROP INDEX %(name)s ON %(table)s'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_rename_index
      :value: 'ALTER TABLE %(table)s RENAME INDEX %(old_name)s TO %(new_name)s'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_create_pk
      :value: 'ALTER TABLE %(table)s ADD CONSTRAINT %(name)s PRIMARY KEY (%(columns)s)'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_delete_pk
      :value: 'ALTER TABLE %(table)s DROP PRIMARY KEY'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_create_index
      :value: 'CREATE INDEX %(name)s ON %(table)s (%(columns)s)%(extra)s'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_alter_table_comment
      :value: 'ALTER TABLE %(table)s COMMENT = %(comment)s'



   .. py:attribute:: sql_alter_column_comment
      :value: None



   .. py:property:: sql_delete_check


   .. py:property:: sql_rename_column
